electrified_subtitle: On to better. On to electric.

highlights.title: A future you don’t have to wait for
highlights.comment: It’s here. Now. Sleeker and more sophisticated, the new KONA Electric features an updated design, the very latest smart tech - and up to 484km* range on a single charge.
highlights.description: *Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. It is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped. Technical data not final. 0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version.

highlights.title: Range
highlights.comment: Nobody ever said that electric mobility had to be boring: Enjoy sporty electric acceleration and up to 484km* driving range on a single charge.
highlights.description: *Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. It is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped. Technical data not final. 0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version.

highlights.title: Exterior
highlights.comment: The new KONA Electric has undergone a comprehensive redesign, with sleeker and more refined lines further enhancing its uniquely confident look - setting it apart from every SUV in the class.

highlights.title: Interior
highlights.comment: Rugged, yet refined - perfect for an active lifestyle - the new design updates match the exterior flair every step of the way.

charging.title: Charge at home
charging.comment: Plug in your KONA Electric overnight, and wake up to a fully charged battery.

charging.title: Charge at work
charging.comment: One less stop to worry about after work. A growing number of companies are offering charging stations.

charging.title: Charge everywhere
charging.comment: Hyundai’s Charging Station Finder shows you real-time charging station information such as location connector types, and availability on the Bluelink® app on your phone and on your cars navigation display.

benefits.title: Cost and CO₂ reduction
benefits.comment: The KONA Electric is not only a zero emissions vehicle: often the cost of operation is lower compared to combustion counterparts, especially if you charge it at home.*
benefits.description: *The relative operational costs of this vehicle compared to one with an internal combustion engine can vary depending on energy prices and which ICE is being compared.

benefits.title: Fast charging
benefits.comment: KONA Electric’s lithium-ion polymer battery* only takes about 47 min to charge from 10% to 80% state of charge (SOC) when using a 100kW direct current (DC) fast-charger station.
benefits.description: *0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version. Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. it is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

benefits.title: Impressive 484km* driving range
benefits.comment: Nobody ever said that electric mobility had to be boring: Enjoy sporty electric acceleration and up to 484km* driving range on a single charge.
benefits.description: *0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version. Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. it is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

benefits.title: Less maintenance, lower cost
benefits.comment: While an internal combustion engine contains hundreds of moving parts, an electric motor only needs around half a dozen, significantly reducing the probability of something breaking. There is no need for oil changes, either.

highlights.title: The beauty of electric innovation
highlights.comment: Breathtaking beautiful and amazingly advanced, the IONIQ 5 is refining the way people look at electic cars.

highlights.title: Exterior
highlights.comment: Distinctive. Iconic. Pure. Concept car design in series

contents.comment: From night to bright in 256 pixels
Bold and bright in the back

highlights.comment:
Live, drive, work, relax.
The lines between living space
and moving space are being blurred.

benefits.title: Ultra fast battery charging
benefits.comment:
Charge up to 80% in 18 minutes.
Gain 100km range in 5 minutes.
benefits.description: *0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version. Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. it is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

benefits.title: Driving range of up to 481 km
benefits.comment:
With Hyundai’s cutting-edge smart tech,
the launch version of IONIQ 5 with all-wheel drive delivers a range up to 481 km*.
benefits.description: *0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version. Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. it is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

Less maintenance,
Lower cost
benefits.comment:
While an internal combustion engine contains hundreds of moving parts,
an electric motor only needs around
half a dozen, significantly reducing
the probability of something breaking.
There is no need for oil changes, either.

highlights.title: Fast charging, long driving
highlights.comment: Never stop for petrol again. The new IONIQ Electric gives you an all-electric driving range of 311km on a single charge.*
highlights.description: *Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. It is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

highlights.title: Exterior
highlights.comment: Designed for beauty -  but engineered for efficiency.

charging.title: Charge at home
charging.comment: Plug in your IONIQ Electric overnight, and wake up to a fully charged battery.

charging.title: Charge at work
charging.comment: One less stop to worry about after work. A growing number of companies are offering charging stations.

charging.title: Charge everywhere
charging.comment: Hyundai’s Charging Station Finder shows you real-time charging station information such as location connector types, and availability on the Bluelink® app on your phone and on your cars navigation display.

benefits.title: Cost and CO₂ reduction
benefits.comment: The IONIQ Electric is not only a zero emissions vehicle: often the cost of operation is lower compared to combustion counterparts, especially if you charge it at home*.
benefits.description: *The relative operational costs of this vehicle compared to one with an internal combustion engine can vary depending on energy prices and which ICE is being compared.

benefits.title: Fast charging
benefits.comment: Thanks to an on-board-charger that has been upgraded to 7.2kW, the battery only takes about 54 minutes to charge to 80% state of charge at a 100kW DC fast charger station.
benefits.description: *0 to 100km/h acceleration in 7.9 seconds for the 64kWh battery version and 9.9 seconds for 39.2kWh version. Range according to WLTP cycle. Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. it is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

benefits.title: Driving range of up to 311km
benefits.comment: Never stop for petrol again. Producing zero tailpipe emissions while providing a thrilling driving experience, the new IONIQ Electric gives you an all-electric driving range of 311km on a single charge*.
benefits.description: *Driving range may vary slightly depending on road conditions, your driving style and the temperature. It is also dependent on the type of tyres equipped.

benefits.title: Less maintenance, lower cost
benefits.comment: While an internal combustion engine contains hundreds of moving parts, an electric motor only needs around half a dozen, significantly reducing the probability of something breaking. There is no need for oil changes, either.
